entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
